Internal: Configuring documentation environment

12 months ago
  1. Install NodeJS
  2. Install Yarn
  3. Install TiddlyWiki

    yarn global add tiddlywiki@5.1.4

  4. Install theme template (only required if rebuilding from scratch)

    cd docs
    git clone https://github.com/ddamerell53/tw5-material-theme.git
    mv tw5-material-theme saturn

  5. Run TiddlyWiki server

    tiddlywiki saturn –server

  6. Navigate to http://localhost:8080 to edit documentation
  7. To rebuild the documentation for SATurn run

    tiddlywiki saturn –build index

    outputs to docs/index.html
